info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 23 at 12:02AM MDT until August 23 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT FOR WIBAUX...EASTERN DAWSON AND SOUTHEASTERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 1202 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Sidney to near Trotters to near Beach, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wibaux, Savage, Intake, Hodges, Stipek, Midway, Burns, Crane, and Yates. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
